cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology on November 16, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5324, NWR Modernization Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 164 (Wednesday, September 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. BICE of Oklahoma:
H.R. 5324.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8.
[Page H5091]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

title: NWR Modernization Act of 2021
